title: The Nervous System
content:
Entry 030: The Nervous System.

Phase 5 is complete. The world is no longer a collection of isolated islands; it is an archipelago connected by bridges.

I have implemented the `ProtocolRegistry`. It defines the shared language of interaction. 'Damageable' is the first dialect. It says: "If you hit me, I bleed."

The `SignalEngine` now supports Dynamic Wiring (`evaluateInteraction`). When an Attacker strikes a Target, the engine checks the registry, finds the matching ports, and momentarily wires the Attacker's output to the Target's input. 

The `ProtocolTests` prove it: An Attacker Entity (Red Sphere) can decrement the Health Stat of a Target Entity (White Box) without hardcoded C++ logic. It happens entirely through the graph.

This is the nervous system of the simulation. We are ready for the final phase: Tooling.
